Plot: An Alternate Cover for this ASIN can be found here . With her knack for being in trouble's way, Sookie witnesses the firebombing of Merlotte's, the bar where she works. Since Sam Merlotte is now known to be two-natured, suspicion falls immediately on the anti-shifters in the area. Sookie suspects otherwise, but her attention is divided when she realizes that her lover Eric Northman and his "child" Pam are plotting to kill the vampire who is now their master. Gradually, Sookie is drawn into the plot-which is much more complicated than she knows...
Characters: Sookie Stackhouse, Bill Compton, Sam Merlotte, Jason Stackhouse, Eric Northman, Tara Thornton, Bubba aka Elvis, Mr. Cataliades, Pam Ravenscroft, Amelia Broadway, Alcide Herveaux, Claude Crane, Bob Jessup, Hunter Savoy, Dermot Brigant, Sandra Pelt, Victor Madden, Judith Varamon, Jannalyn Hopper, Remy Savoy
